Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ashland/33rd
ShortDescription: Northbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 35th, Damen, Archer and Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/33rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 35th, Damen, Archer and Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/33rd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with delays near Oak Park due to an earlier door problem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with delays near Oak Park due to an earlier door problem.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
